mapper.select: select count(*) from MEMBERS where ID=#{id}
select count(*) from MEMBERS where ID=#{id} and PW=#{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBERS(ID, PW, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ZIPCODE, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, JOIN_DATE) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, sysdate)
